id: ‘This is next-level geopolitics’: USMCA China trade clause will test how willing Canada is to tempt fate with U.S.EconomyTop Stories
paragraph: October 18, 20183:59 PM EDTAPMA president Flavio Volpe speaks with the Financial Post’s Larysa Harapyn about how the USMCA’s China trade clause could impact supply chains in Canada.We want to improve your reading experience
